h1.span: Batteries That Never Let You Down

div.class: carousel-content o_colored_level o_grid_item g-col-lg-4 rounded o_cc o_cc4 g-height-3 col-lg-4

p.span: Industrial batteries and solutions for wide industry applications.

a.class: btn btn-custom text-o-color-1 bg-o-color-4 btn-custom desktop_bottom_-3

section.class: s_three_columns pt32 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc1 pb0

p.font: Lightweight with low self-discharge, our Li-ion Accu is engineered for reliability and longevity. It delivers a stable 1.5V output for over 95% of its runtime and can be recharged up to 1000 times. Available in various sizes and shapes.

img.class: card-img-top o_we_image_cropped img img-fluid o_we_custom_image desktop_product_categ_img

p.font: Our advanced batteries provide high performance, making them ideal for devices requiring extended runtime. They ensure sustained and reliable power for peak efficiency and are available in AA, AAA, and 9V sizes.

section.class: s_three_columns pb32 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc1 pt8

p.font: High Performance for Mid to High-Tech Devices Tailored for optimal functionality in mid to high-tech devices, ensuring efficient power delivery and are available in AA, AAA sizes.

img.class: card-img-top o_we_image_cropped img img-fluid o_we_custom_image desktop_product_categ_img

p.font: Whether you're charging AA, AAA, C, D, or 9V batteries, our charger ensures efficient and convenient power management for all your devices. Capable of charging multiple types of batteries simultaneously with ease.

h2.span: Power Solutions For All Your Devices

p.font: Uniross designs, manufactures, and markets 'in-demand' portable energy solutions, offering innovative products and custom solutions that enhance the reliability, energy efficiency, and sustainability of portable power.

div.p: With over five decades of expertise, our tailored solutions have empowered businesses of all sizes worldwide to gain a competitive edge and increase their market share.
